unit_description_short_texts.text: placeholder

text.last_approved_text: When the souls are released, they endeavour not to return without new victims to torment for eternity.

unit_description_short_texts.text: When the souls are released, they endeavour not to return without new victims to torment for eternity.

text.last_approved_text: What’s scarier than being bombarded with skulls from a distance? Why, if they are on fire and screaming in anguish of course!

unit_description_short_texts.text: What’s scarier than being bombarded with skulls from a distance? Why, if they are on fire and screaming in anguish of course!

text.last_approved_text: Each serpentine steed is spurred to acts of great brutality in the name of the king.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Each serpentine steed is spurred to acts of great brutality in the name of the king.

text.last_approved_text: Tethered to their mounts by a sharp hook, the other mummified hand wields a barbed staff to carve through mortal flesh.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Tethered to their mounts by a sharp hook, the other mummified hand wields a barbed staff to carve through mortal flesh.

text.last_approved_text: Channelling her ancient, ageless fury, the Asp-Goddess’ chosen riders bite with her deadly venom.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Channelling her ancient, ageless fury, the Asp-Goddess’ chosen riders bite with her deadly venom.

text.last_approved_text: Skeletal steeds instinctively obey the will of their riders, displaying the same supernatural discipline.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Skeletal steeds instinctively obey the will of their riders, displaying the same supernatural discipline.

text.last_approved_text: Emerging from the desert dust clouds, these horsemen come charging out of the storm, and death rides with them.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Emerging from the desert dust clouds, these horsemen come charging out of the storm, and death rides with them.

text.last_approved_text: Amidst a churning cloud of heaved-up sand, these Undead warriors charge their foes with supernatural determination.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Amidst a churning cloud of heaved-up sand, these Undead warriors charge their foes with supernatural determination.

text.last_approved_text: These riders never tire and can chase foes down over countless leagues, until their dying moment.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These riders never tire and can chase foes down over countless leagues, until their dying moment.

text.last_approved_text: "Nagash must rise, or our realms of silence will fall."

unit_description_short_texts.text: "Nagash must rise, or our realms of silence will fall."

text.last_approved_text: Khalida marches to war with all the poise she had in life, yet more brutal and merciless than ever.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Khalida marches to war with all the poise she had in life, yet more brutal and merciless than ever.

text.last_approved_text: The Liche Lord, ancient beyond memory, wanders the deserts in search of powerful artefacts to restore his beloved kingdom to its former glory.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Liche Lord, ancient beyond memory, wanders the deserts in search of powerful artefacts to restore his beloved kingdom to its former glory.

text.last_approved_text: The savage desert itself obeys the one who summons the dunes and the dead to fight for him.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The savage desert itself obeys the one who summons the dunes and the dead to fight for him.

text.last_approved_text: The keeper of the arcane lore casts terrible curses, summoning vengeful desert spirits to feast upon their souls.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The keeper of the arcane lore casts terrible curses, summoning vengeful desert spirits to feast upon their souls.

text.last_approved_text: All the Necrotects see now is purity besmirched. With a whipcrack they strive once more for perfection.

unit_description_short_texts.text: All the Necrotects see now is purity besmirched. With a whipcrack they strive once more for perfection.

text.last_approved_text: Settra ruled over the most magnificent realm ever known; now he will see it restored.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Settra ruled over the most magnificent realm ever known; now he will see it restored.

text.last_approved_text: The Tomb Kings know nothing but rage and the desire to reclaim their lost kingdoms.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Tomb Kings know nothing but rage and the desire to reclaim their lost kingdoms.

text.last_approved_text: Entombed alongside their mighty sovereign, Nehekhara's deathless princes are reawakened to command the Undead legions.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Entombed alongside their mighty sovereign, Nehekhara's deathless princes are reawakened to command the Undead legions.

text.last_approved_text: The Warriors of Nehekhara remember only their duty to their king, and pursue his enemies with ruthless purpose.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Warriors of Nehekhara remember only their duty to their king, and pursue his enemies with ruthless purpose.

text.last_approved_text: The faceless God of the Underworld guides dead souls to the other life – some at the price of their service in battle.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The faceless God of the Underworld guides dead souls to the other life – some at the price of their service in battle.

text.last_approved_text: These desiccated husks remember how to shoot; a hail of endless death to thin the foe's numbers.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These desiccated husks remember how to shoot; a hail of endless death to thin the foe's numbers.

text.last_approved_text: Existing only to serve, the Hawk-God’s blessed archers deliver his swift justice – a rain of death from above – long after their own lives have ended.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Existing only to serve, the Hawk-God’s blessed archers deliver his swift justice – a rain of death from above – long after their own lives have ended.

text.last_approved_text: Spears extend, like gnarled and sharpened bones, held firmly in place by their deathly-grip.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Spears extend, like gnarled and sharpened bones, held firmly in place by their deathly-grip.

text.last_approved_text: Elite amongst their skeletal peers, these spear-armed warriors are as bloodthirsty as their infamous royal patron.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Elite amongst their skeletal peers, these spear-armed warriors are as bloodthirsty as their infamous royal patron.

text.last_approved_text: The Undead devotees of the Tomb Kings are risen again, unswervingly loyal to their liege.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Undead devotees of the Tomb Kings are risen again, unswervingly loyal to their liege.

text.last_approved_text: These guards' loyalty in life was rewarded; now they are expected to show it once more.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These guards' loyalty in life was rewarded; now they are expected to show it once more.

text.last_approved_text: Their great weapons are wielded as expertly as they did in life, slaying for Lord and glory!

unit_description_short_texts.text: Their great weapons are wielded as expertly as they did in life, slaying for Lord and glory!

text.last_approved_text: Like the flesh-eating, skull-faced beetle, whose name they bear, this dual-wielding, elite Tomb Guard bring a new level of terror to the battlefield.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Like the flesh-eating, skull-faced beetle, whose name they bear, this dual-wielding, elite Tomb Guard bring a new level of terror to the battlefield.

text.last_approved_text: "The Carrion of the Desert, whose mighty outstretched wings darken the sun on the day of slaughter."

unit_description_short_texts.text: "The Carrion of the Desert, whose mighty outstretched wings darken the sun on the day of slaughter."

text.last_approved_text: The keen eyes of Djaf’s Carrion can spot a meal - or an artillery target - over great distances.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The keen eyes of Djaf’s Carrion can spot a meal - or an artillery target - over great distances.

text.last_approved_text: Death's true face radiates sinister magic; the cruel laughter of ancient gods echoes within its shadow.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Death's true face radiates sinister magic; the cruel laughter of ancient gods echoes within its shadow.

text.last_approved_text: The living are scythed down as these nightmarish beasts glide and bound amongst their helpless, terrified prey.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The living are scythed down as these nightmarish beasts glide and bound amongst their helpless, terrified prey.

text.last_approved_text: The fury of the gods made stone, these chosen Sphinxes augment their brutal scythe-attack with magic and fire.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The fury of the gods made stone, these chosen Sphinxes augment their brutal scythe-attack with magic and fire.

text.last_approved_text: These sentinels mark the borders of the Tomb Kings' realm, submerged in the sand, waiting to strike at the unsuspecting.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These sentinels mark the borders of the Tomb Kings' realm, submerged in the sand, waiting to strike at the unsuspecting.

text.last_approved_text: Lying in wait, biding their time. The desert sees all. Nothing escapes.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Lying in wait, biding their time. The desert sees all. Nothing escapes.

text.last_approved_text: They can burrow for leagues when summoned, bursting into battle with a blast of sand and snapping limbs.

unit_description_short_texts.text: They can burrow for leagues when summoned, bursting into battle with a blast of sand and snapping limbs.

text.last_approved_text: With a swish of their lethal, poisoned tails, the foe is rendered paralysed and helpless, to be consumed by ravening jaws.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With a swish of their lethal, poisoned tails, the foe is rendered paralysed and helpless, to be consumed by ravening jaws.

text.last_approved_text: The physical embodiment of the everlasting gods; curse ye all men who look upon their divine forms!

unit_description_short_texts.text: The physical embodiment of the everlasting gods; curse ye all men who look upon their divine forms!

text.last_approved_text: Tremble at their imposing sight, run in vain from their mighty arrows.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Tremble at their imposing sight, run in vain from their mighty arrows.

text.last_approved_text: Bearing the faces of Nehekhara’s illustrious pantheon, these Ushabti use spear-sized arrows – and the fear of the gods – to strike at the unfortunate foe.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Bearing the faces of Nehekhara’s illustrious pantheon, these Ushabti use spear-sized arrows – and the fear of the gods – to strike at the unfortunate foe.

text.last_approved_text: A monolithic force of destruction on the battlefield - each tremendous footstep crushing many foolish warriors underfoot.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A monolithic force of destruction on the battlefield - each tremendous footstep crushing many foolish warriors underfoot.

text.last_approved_text: An unearthly mixture of wood, metal and bone to savage the foe in rending, powerful strikes.

unit_description_short_texts.text: An unearthly mixture of wood, metal and bone to savage the foe in rending, powerful strikes.

text.last_approved_text: From the chariot's elevated platform, archers are offered unparalleled opportunities to fire on the enemy.

unit_description_short_texts.text: From the chariot's elevated platform, archers are offered unparalleled opportunities to fire on the enemy.

text.last_approved_text: Tretch's formidable repertoire of underhanded skills, combined with his famously good luck, has led to a number of legendary deeds!

unit_description_short_texts.text: Tretch's formidable repertoire of underhanded skills, combined with his famously good luck, has led to a number of legendary deeds!

text.last_approved_text: Hollow-eyed murderers, the Doomfire Warlocks must loosen the grip of Slaanesh with the blood of others.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Hollow-eyed murderers, the Doomfire Warlocks must loosen the grip of Slaanesh with the blood of others.

text.last_approved_text: With riders as deadly as their mounts, the Knights of the Ebon Claw are a force to be reckoned with.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With riders as deadly as their mounts, the Knights of the Ebon Claw are a force to be reckoned with.

text.last_approved_text: The Raven Heralds appear from nowhere, leaving piles of corpses in their wake.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Raven Heralds appear from nowhere, leaving piles of corpses in their wake.

text.last_approved_text: Slaanesh has an insatiable appetite for Elven souls, and the Harvesters are only too happy to oblige!

unit_description_short_texts.text: Slaanesh has an insatiable appetite for Elven souls, and the Harvesters are only too happy to oblige!

text.last_approved_text: Greatest of all the Brides of Khaine, the many ways of murder are Hellebron's to command.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Greatest of all the Brides of Khaine, the many ways of murder are Hellebron's to command.

text.last_approved_text: The control of beasts is usually the domain of Clar Karond, but there are Sorceresses who can wield the Wind of Ghur as well as any lash.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The control of beasts is usually the domain of Clar Karond, but there are Sorceresses who can wield the Wind of Ghur as well as any lash.

text.last_approved_text: Death stalks all that come to Ghrond, and those who wield the power of Shyish are more adept than most in murder's arcane arts.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Death stalks all that come to Ghrond, and those who wield the power of Shyish are more adept than most in murder's arcane arts.

text.last_approved_text: A Supreme Sorceress excels at not just Dark Magic, but also the ability to control and summon beasts - a mistress of Ghur.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A Supreme Sorceress excels at not just Dark Magic, but also the ability to control and summon beasts - a mistress of Ghur.

text.last_approved_text: Is there any greater dealer of death than a Sorceress at the height of her powers? Perhaps… but none will take as great a joy in unleashing it.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Is there any greater dealer of death than a Sorceress at the height of her powers? Perhaps… but none will take as great a joy in unleashing it.

text.last_approved_text: Death stalks all that come to Ghrond, and those who wield the power of Shyish are more adept than most in murder's arcane arts.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Death stalks all that come to Ghrond, and those who wield the power of Shyish are more adept than most in murder's arcane arts.

text.last_approved_text: The hot, searing Red Wind blows down from the north to inflame passions and, if not used carefully, the spellcasters themselves.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The hot, searing Red Wind blows down from the north to inflame passions and, if not used carefully, the spellcasters themselves.

text.last_approved_text: Supreme Sorceresses wield powerful magic that lesser mortals can only dream of.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Supreme Sorceresses wield powerful magic that lesser mortals can only dream of.

text.last_approved_text: Like their mistress, the Blades of the Blood Queen glory in bloodshed.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Like their mistress, the Blades of the Blood Queen glory in bloodshed.

text.last_approved_text: The Sisters of Slaughter are creatures of instinct, impossible to predict and unfathomably deadly.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Sisters of Slaughter are creatures of instinct, impossible to predict and unfathomably deadly.

text.last_approved_text: The sisters specialise in the three D's: doom, death and destruction.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The sisters specialise in the three D's: doom, death and destruction.

text.last_approved_text: A bolt in the eye is a terrible way to die, and the calling card of the Bolt-fiends.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A bolt in the eye is a terrible way to die, and the calling card of the Bolt-fiends.

text.last_approved_text: Disciplined and merciless, it is a pleasure to watch the Hellebronai work.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Disciplined and merciless, it is a pleasure to watch the Hellebronai work.

text.last_approved_text: The Chill of Sontar is a ruthless killing machine.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Chill of Sontar is a ruthless killing machine.

text.last_approved_text: These incarnations of Khaine strike fear in to all those who stand before them.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These incarnations of Khaine strike fear in to all those who stand before them.

text.last_approved_text: A loathsome beast of uncharted depths possessing colossal strength and insatiable hunger.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A loathsome beast of uncharted depths possessing colossal strength and insatiable hunger.

text.last_approved_text: Called forth by the Horn of the Ancestors, ready to once again slay the foes of the Karaz Ankor.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Called forth by the Horn of the Ancestors, ready to once again slay the foes of the Karaz Ankor.

text.last_approved_text: The mighty deeds of the Fireborn are spoken of in hushed tones by all the princes of Caledor.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The mighty deeds of the Fireborn are spoken of in hushed tones by all the princes of Caledor.

text.last_approved_text: The Heralds are renowned for their ability to read the ebb and flow of battle.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Heralds are renowned for their ability to read the ebb and flow of battle.

text.last_approved_text: Alarielle the Radiant, High Priestess of Isha and Everqueen of Ulthuan.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Alarielle the Radiant, High Priestess of Isha and Everqueen of Ulthuan.

text.last_approved_text: Alith Anar is the Shadow King, a revenant who seeks the grisly death of every Dark Elf in retribution for Malekith’s sins.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Alith Anar is the Shadow King, a revenant who seeks the grisly death of every Dark Elf in retribution for Malekith’s sins.

text.last_approved_text: At all times these beautiful warriors accompany the Everqueen, as her advisors and protectors.

unit_description_short_texts.text: At all times these beautiful warriors accompany the Everqueen, as her advisors and protectors.

text.last_approved_text: High Elves have been studying the night skies long before the astromancers of the Empire, and so can freely manipulate the Wind of Azyr.

unit_description_short_texts.text: High Elves have been studying the night skies long before the astromancers of the Empire, and so can freely manipulate the Wind of Azyr.

text.last_approved_text: The Mages of Saphery excel at all forms of magic; the spells of shadows and illusion are no exception.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Mages of Saphery excel at all forms of magic; the spells of shadows and illusion are no exception.

text.last_approved_text: Only the purest of heart may serve the Everqueen.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Only the purest of heart may serve the Everqueen.

text.last_approved_text: These silent sentinels guard the Shrine of Asuryan.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These silent sentinels guard the Shrine of Asuryan.

text.last_approved_text: Defenders of Cothique and chosen by the Lord of the Deeps himself.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Defenders of Cothique and chosen by the Lord of the Deeps himself.

text.last_approved_text: The Shadow Warriors of Nagarythe are grim soldiers who fight for revenge alone.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Shadow Warriors of Nagarythe are grim soldiers who fight for revenge alone.

text.last_approved_text: With hearts to match that of Charandis himself, the Puremane Company are fearless.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With hearts to match that of Charandis himself, the Puremane Company are fearless.

text.last_approved_text: Guardians of the sacred places of Avelorn, these peerless archers are incorruptible.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Guardians of the sacred places of Avelorn, these peerless archers are incorruptible.

text.last_approved_text: The Elves of the Grey have battled ceaselessly for generations, and will continue that tradition for generations to come.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Elves of the Grey have battled ceaselessly for generations, and will continue that tradition for generations to come.

text.last_approved_text: The sight of the Storm Riders' banners strikes fear in to the hearts of even the most merciless Druchii.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The sight of the Storm Riders' banners strikes fear in to the hearts of even the most merciless Druchii.

text.last_approved_text: Great warriors and doomseekers who have unsuccessfully found death thus far... even against Giants.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Great warriors and doomseekers who have unsuccessfully found death thus far... even against Giants.

text.last_approved_text: The Shadow King’s right-hand Elf is as committed to the Druchii’s destruction as his murderous monarch.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Shadow King’s right-hand Elf is as committed to the Druchii’s destruction as his murderous monarch.

text.last_approved_text: The Shadow King’s right-hand Elf is just as committed to the Druchii’s destruction as his murderous monarch.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Shadow King’s right-hand Elf is just as committed to the Druchii’s destruction as his murderous monarch.

text.last_approved_text: As well as commanding bands of Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers form an elite retinue of Nagarythe’s finest to accompany Alith Anar into battle.

unit_description_short_texts.text: As well as commanding bands of Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers form an elite retinue of Nagarythe’s finest to accompany Alith Anar into battle.

text.last_approved_text: Broadside cannons for sinking mortal ships are devastating when used in the field, pulverising living flesh and solid walls.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Broadside cannons for sinking mortal ships are devastating when used in the field, pulverising living flesh and solid walls.

text.last_approved_text: This Hellhammer Cannon has been refined by the Pirate King himself to be one of the most feared artillery pieces in existence.

unit_description_short_texts.text: This Hellhammer Cannon has been refined by the Pirate King himself to be one of the most feared artillery pieces in existence.

text.last_approved_text: The heinous combination of a Fell Bat and a gun-wielding zombie makes for a hideous, flying horror.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The heinous combination of a Fell Bat and a gun-wielding zombie makes for a hideous, flying horror.

text.last_approved_text: Beware the Deck Droppers’ black powder bombs released indiscriminately – if somewhat inaccurately – from above!

unit_description_short_texts.text: Beware the Deck Droppers’ black powder bombs released indiscriminately – if somewhat inaccurately – from above!

text.last_approved_text: Until their targets lie dead and bullet-riddled, there is no rest for the Salt Lord’s wicked assailants of the skies.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Until their targets lie dead and bullet-riddled, there is no rest for the Salt Lord’s wicked assailants of the skies.

text.last_approved_text: Chastised in life due to their recklessness, these Knights exist past their deaths in an eternal state of ghostly damnation.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Chastised in life due to their recklessness, these Knights exist past their deaths in an eternal state of ghostly damnation.

text.last_approved_text: These eminent horsemen were previously entrusted to defend Bretonnian lands to their dying breath – an event that has long past.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These eminent horsemen were previously entrusted to defend Bretonnian lands to their dying breath – an event that has long past.

text.last_approved_text: Once defined by their ability to face trials and overcome hardships, now their only quest is to attend to the vengeful Madame-Captain.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Once defined by their ability to face trials and overcome hardships, now their only quest is to attend to the vengeful Madame-Captain.

text.last_approved_text: The daughter of Manann himself is the most feared captain in Sartosa, as merciless as an ocean tempest.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The daughter of Manann himself is the most feared captain in Sartosa, as merciless as an ocean tempest.

text.last_approved_text: The Siren of the Storm’s tortured soul vengefully roams the world’s seas, singing her paralysing songs of death.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Siren of the Storm’s tortured soul vengefully roams the world’s seas, singing her paralysing songs of death.

text.last_approved_text: The hiss of the Vampire Admiral’s orders spurs an Undead crew to enact their master’s sinister will.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The hiss of the Vampire Admiral’s orders spurs an Undead crew to enact their master’s sinister will.

text.last_approved_text: Wielding her cursed cutlass, this swashbuckling Vampire cripples and kills all who dare oppose her.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Wielding her cursed cutlass, this swashbuckling Vampire cripples and kills all who dare oppose her.

text.last_approved_text: These former marksmen and artillerymen are as obsessed with gunpowder in death as they were in life.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These former marksmen and artillerymen are as obsessed with gunpowder in death as they were in life.

text.last_approved_text: Served by the reanimated corpses of shipwrecked unfortunates, the Pirate King is a plague upon the world’s seas.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Served by the reanimated corpses of shipwrecked unfortunates, the Pirate King is a plague upon the world’s seas.

text.last_approved_text: Malice personified, a Haunter never knows relief from its manic, all-consuming hunger.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Malice personified, a Haunter never knows relief from its manic, all-consuming hunger.

text.last_approved_text: With power syphoned from the ocean’s Winds, the Dreadfleet commander seeks to drown the mortal world in a tide of death.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With power syphoned from the ocean’s Winds, the Dreadfleet commander seeks to drown the mortal world in a tide of death.

text.last_approved_text: Even the very pinnacles of Bretonnian chivalry and brilliance are not immune to being conjured up as ethereal slaves.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Even the very pinnacles of Bretonnian chivalry and brilliance are not immune to being conjured up as ethereal slaves.

text.last_approved_text: Zombie pirate crews love dragging a big gun into a fight, no matter how unwieldy it might be!

unit_description_short_texts.text: Zombie pirate crews love dragging a big gun into a fight, no matter how unwieldy it might be!

text.last_approved_text: Puppets of Vangheist’s cadaverous warship, driven by Dark Magic to inflict horror and damage in debilitating abundance.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Puppets of Vangheist’s cadaverous warship, driven by Dark Magic to inflict horror and damage in debilitating abundance.

text.last_approved_text: The Blood Knights of the sea are elite, armour-clad sentries to the dreaded seafaring creatures of the night.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Blood Knights of the sea are elite, armour-clad sentries to the dreaded seafaring creatures of the night.

text.last_approved_text: The only thing scarier than a Depth Guard is one with a weapon that gives it an eight-foot reach.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The only thing scarier than a Depth Guard is one with a weapon that gives it an eight-foot reach.

text.last_approved_text: Like the Bloody Reaver upon which they serve, the Deck Guard are forged with the powerful magic of Noctilus himself.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Like the Bloody Reaver upon which they serve, the Deck Guard are forged with the powerful magic of Noctilus himself.

text.last_approved_text: Their howls turn even the bravest sailors stark white, spearing their souls like a lance through the heart.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Their howls turn even the bravest sailors stark white, spearing their souls like a lance through the heart.

text.last_approved_text: These Undead mariners are competent crewmen and relentless fighters, making them ideal pirates.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These Undead mariners are competent crewmen and relentless fighters, making them ideal pirates.

text.last_approved_text: The Deckhands’ polearms are rusty extensions of the decomposing arms that brandish them.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Deckhands’ polearms are rusty extensions of the decomposing arms that brandish them.

text.last_approved_text: These reanimated Norscans are Unliving proof that Manann’s will can be manifested from death as well as life.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These reanimated Norscans are Unliving proof that Manann’s will can be manifested from death as well as life.

text.last_approved_text: The random discharge of noisy, indiscriminate firepower gives the Gunnery Mob a small spark of satisfaction enjoyed in life.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The random discharge of noisy, indiscriminate firepower gives the Gunnery Mob a small spark of satisfaction enjoyed in life.

text.last_approved_text: Undead minions have no fear of blowing themselves up, making them ideal gunpowder-keg-launchers!

unit_description_short_texts.text: Undead minions have no fear of blowing themselves up, making them ideal gunpowder-keg-launchers!

text.last_approved_text: Where marksmanship might be lacking, a more powerful firearm will usually suffice.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Where marksmanship might be lacking, a more powerful firearm will usually suffice.

text.last_approved_text: Rifles afford better accuracy, which can be advantageous for the clumsy hands of the rotting Undead.

text.last_approved_text: His is the grim, unending task of uprooting and shattering evil in all its forms.

text.last_approved_text: Calling upon violent storms, these monsters manifest their anger in terrifying lightning displays that frequently end in mass death.

text.last_approved_text: The ichor of the Gods flows through the veins of those from the God-touched wilderness.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The ichor of the Gods flows through the veins of those from the God-touched wilderness.

text.last_approved_text: Merciless and psychotic, these frenzied Berserkers kill with total devotion to the God of Warriors.

text.last_approved_text: Beware the dark, brutish shadows that dwell in the foggy depths of the marsh!

text.last_approved_text: Ravenous beasts summoned from the Realm of Chaos itself, slobbering with an insatiable hunger to tear at living flesh.

text.last_approved_text: Armoured carapaces brindled with bloody gristle cover these truly voracious killers of frightening appearance.

text.last_approved_text: A legendary destroyer of both the physical and metaphysical, annihilating souls by trampling foes into an unrecognisable pulp.

text.last_approved_text: Otherworldly riders, swift and formidable, fighting viciously in the name of the Lord of all forests and beasts.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Otherworldly riders, swift and formidable, fighting viciously in the name of the Lord of all forests and beasts.

text.last_approved_text: These noble sons from the High Realms of Athel Loren practice the art of war with obsession.

text.last_approved_text: The most favoured Asrai of the Trickster God are dazzling, deceptive, and deadly in equal measure.

text.last_approved_text: A shower of arrows let loose from behind a constricting wall of smoke awaits any trespassing enemies of the forest.

text.last_approved_text: Centuries of defending the forest against the malevolent spirits of the Wildwood has gifted them an unparalleled vigilance.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Centuries of defending the forest against the malevolent spirits of the Wildwood has gifted them an unparalleled vigilance.

text.last_approved_text: Within these living, walking timbers, the souls of great Elven warriors wield powers of incendiary magic.
